title: Mysterious Intruder (restored, colorized) (1946, film noir, imdb score: 6.3)

sources.title: Mysterious Intruder Restored Colorized 1946 Film Noir Imdb Score 6.3
sources.description: Mysterious Intruder is a 1946 American  mystery film   noir  based on the  radio drama   The Whistler . Directed by  William Castle , the production features  Richard Dix ,  Barton MacLane  and  Nina Vale . [1]  It is the fifth of  Columbia Pictures ' eight " Whistler " films produced in the 1940s, the first seven starring Dix.
